column5: Warm, sunny and bursting with color, our 3BR/2BA canal-front condo Port Royal at Fortuna Bay has an easy-breezy vibe. Enjoy a deck overlooking Fortuna Bay and an onsite pool and hot tub. The beach, Schlitterbaun and restaurants are all within 5 minutes.
column8: Canal Front Condo, Pool, Minutes to Beach -North Padre Island
